sentences.english: It exhorts to faith and courage.
The police are also urging him to have his daughter's body cremated quickly, he said.
sentences.chinese: 警察還極力敦促他儘快將女兒的遺體火化，陳廣乾說。

sentences.english: The women my mother denigrated were the ones urging me towards independence.
sentences.chinese: 我母親所詆譭的女士們都敦促我走向獨立。

sentences.english: " He believes that population decline constitute a threat to national development, the initiative "every family raising three or even more children.
sentences.chinese: 他敦促每個家庭養育三四個孩子，以化解人口危機。

sentences.english: The group urges schools to stop selling full-calorie soft drinks.
sentences.chinese: 協會還敦促學校停止出售富含熱量的軟飲料。

sentences.english: We also urge opposition parties to present their manifestoes to voters as early as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我們還敦促在野黨儘早發佈他們對選民的政治宣言。

sentences.english: Pending the treaty's entry into force, I urge all States to implement a moratorium on all nuclear explosions.
sentences.chinese: 在條約生效之前，我敦促所有國家暫停所有核爆炸。

sentences.english: They urged the food industry to reduce levels of acrylamide in their products.
sentences.chinese: 他們敦促食品行業要減少產品中丙稀酰胺的含量。

sentences.english: Others urged the government not to re-submit it.
sentences.chinese: 其他的人敦促政府不要重新提交該法案。

sentences.english: The police are always urged to crack down on drug addicts.
sentences.chinese: 人們總是敦促警察好好治治吸毒癮君子。

sentences.english: Mr Dlamini said the protesters urged the government not to cut health spending.
sentences.chinese: 米尼說，抗議者們就是想敦促政府不能削減醫療費用。

sentences.english: He also urged the US side to take strong measures and earnestly solve China's concerns.
sentences.chinese: 他還敦促美方採取有力措施，切實解決中方有關關切。

sentences.english: The operator urged him to keep driving until he reached the light at Greenville Boulevard.
sentences.chinese: 接線員敦促他將車開到格林威爾大道。

sentences.english: The opposition Democratic Progressive Party, which Chen once led, has urged the government to free him immediately.
sentences.chinese: 在野黨民進黨，陳曾經領導過，敦促政府立即釋放他。

sentences.english: Holmes urged the jury to ignore it.
sentences.chinese: 霍爾姆斯敦促陪審團忽略貝內關於基因的證詞。

sentences.english: I and others on our team had urged Arafat to prevent violence.
sentences.chinese: 我和代表團的其他成員一直敦促阿拉法特制止暴力。

definition: to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
to take action/to adopt policies/to move on some issue
to supervise and urge completion of a task/to urge on
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
